1. 2ethylhexyl bromide
2. Cs 2 CO 3 (Cesium carbonate)
3. 4,5bis(2-ethylhexyloxy)benzodithiophene (4)

Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.

These are the entities in the paragraph that clearly refer to Material Names. Cs2CO3 (Cesium carbonate) is not a material name in this context, as it is mentioned as a catalyst.
